name: css-animation-iteration-count
description: Css module of single purpose classes for animation iteration count

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-animation-iteration-count.css > css/css-animation-iteration-count.css && tachyons src/css-animation-iteration-count.css --minify > css/css-animation-iteration-count.min.css && tachyons src/css-animation-iteration-count.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
